entry.title: Ex-mayor Marutyan joins race to lead Yerevan

media:group.media:title: Ex-mayor Marutyan joins race to lead Yerevan
media:group.media:description:
üìçA group of United Nations experts called on Azerbaijan to lift its more than seven-month blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh. üìçFormer Yerevan mayor Hayk Marutyan confirmed he will run in the capital‚Äôs upcoming mayoral elections, slated for mid-September. üìçArmenian weightlifter Garik Karapetyan took home the gold medal at this year‚Äôs European U20 Weightlifting Championship.
#dailyarmenia #CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©

media:group.media:title: CivilNet, with New Faces
media:group.media:description:
Emilio Cricchio and Patrick Elliott sit down together in the CivilNet studio to discuss a small change to the CivilNet team. Emilio will be leaving the CivilNet team as he heads to London to participate in a journalism program, whilst Patrick will be joining the team. Patrick also explains what brought him to Armenia and what keeps him there.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©

entry.title: Connecting Armenian Studies in Armenia and Diaspora

media:group.media:title: Connecting Armenian Studies in Armenia and Diaspora
media:group.media:description:
Vahe Sahakyan, Senior Information Resources Specialist at the University of Michigan-Dearborn Armenian Research Center, sat down with CivilNet on the sidelines of the Armenian Society of Fellows conference in Dilijan, Armenia, to discuss how the fellows conference is a great example of connectivity between Armenia and the diaspora, especially among academic circles. Sahakyan also discusses the changing nature and definition of the Armenian diaspora, and how an understanding of the diaspora entity is key to benefitting Armenia.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©

entry.title: Karabakh president confirms Baku rejected direct talks

media:group.media:title: Karabakh president confirms Baku rejected direct talks
media:group.media:description:
üìçNagorno-Karabakh President Arayik Harutyunyan confirmed Baku pulled out of a planned meeting with Stepanakert in Europe earlier this month. üìçVartan Oskanian, Armenia‚Äôs former foreign minister, called on Armenia to base its negotiating position on the fact of Nagorno-Karabakh‚Äôs former autonomy within Soviet Azerbaijan. üìçGyumri, Armenia‚Äôs second city, is anticipating an influx of more than 11,000 visitors as the city hosts this year‚Äôs Pan-Armenian Games for the first time.

entry.title: ‚ÄòAzerbaijan‚Äôs blockade of Karabakh is attempted genocide‚Äô

media:group.media:title: ‚ÄòAzerbaijan‚Äôs blockade of Karabakh is attempted genocide‚Äô
media:group.media:description:
CivilNet analyst Eric Hacopian discusses Azerbaijan‚Äôs ongoing blockade of Artsakh (Karabakh) and what the international community‚Äôs redlines. Eric reacts to Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev‚Äôs recent interview with Euronews during which he stated that his life mission was to win a war, as well as the recent detention of a Karabakh Armenian who was being transported by the International Committee of the Red Cross to Armenia for medical treatment.

entry.title: Ronald Suny: The Empire Moves South: Tsarist Russia, the USSR, and the Caucasus

media:group.media:title: Ronald Suny: The Empire Moves South: Tsarist Russia, the USSR, and the Caucasus
media:group.media:description:
Ronald Grigor Suny‚Äôs keynote address at an international symposium on Russia organized by the Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey in Yerevan and Tsaghkadzor, Armenia, on July 2-12, 2023.
Ronald Grigor Suny is a distinguished University Professor of History and Professor of Political Science Emeritus at the University of Michigan and Emeritus Professor of Political Science and History at the University of Chicago.

media:group.media:title: ’ç÷á’°’∂‚Ä§ ’´’∂’π’∫’•’Ω ’¥’´’°÷Å’∂’•’¨ ’¨’´’≥’∂ ’∏÷Ç ÷Ñ’°’≤’°÷Ñ’®
media:group.media:description:
’ç÷á’°’∂’° ’¨’´’≥’® ’Ä’°’µ’°’Ω’ø’°’∂’´ ’°’º’°’ª’°’ø’°÷Ä ’¶’¢’∏’Ω’°’∑÷Ä’ª’°’µ’´’∂ ’∏÷Ç’≤’≤’∏÷Ç’©’µ’∏÷Ç’∂’∂’•÷Ä’´÷Å ’ß, ’£’¨’≠’°’æ’∏÷Ä ’ø’•’Ω’°÷Ä’™’°’∂ ’æ’°’µ÷Ä’•÷Ä’´÷Å ’¥’•’Ø’®: ‘∏’∂’§’°’¥’•’∂’® ’¥’´ ÷Ñ’°’∂’´ ’Ø’´’¨’∏’¥’•’ø÷Ä ’°’µ’∂ ’Ø’∏’≤’¥ ’ç÷á’°’∂ ÷Ñ’°’≤’°÷Ñ’∂ ’ß, ’∏÷Ä’® ’∫’•’ø÷Ñ ’ß ÷Ö’£’ø’æ’•÷Ä ’¨’≥’´ ’∂’•÷Ä’∏÷Ç’™’´÷Å ÷á ’§’°’º’∂’°÷Ä ’¶’¢’∏’Ω’°’∑÷Ä’ª’°’µ’´’∂ ÷Ñ’°’≤’°÷Ñ, ’¢’°’µ÷Å ’°’µ’§’∫’´’Ω’´’∂ ’π’´ ’§’°÷Ä’±’•’¨÷â ‘ª’∂’π’∫’•’û’Ω ’¶’°÷Ä’£’°÷Å’∂’•’¨ ÷Ñ’°’≤’°÷Ñ’®’ù ÷Ö’£’ø’°’£’∏÷Ä’Æ’•’¨’∏’æ ’ª÷Ä’´ ’∏÷Ç’™’®÷â #civilnet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©

¬© ’Ü’µ’∏÷Ç’©’´ ’∞’•’≤’´’∂’°’Ø’°’µ’´’∂ ’´÷Ä’°’æ’∏÷Ç’∂÷Ñ’∂’•÷Ä’® ’∫’°’ø’Ø’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ’•’∂ ’ç’´’æ’´’¨’´’©’°’Ω ’∞’´’¥’∂’°’§÷Ä’°’¥’´’∂: ’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©’´ ’≠’¥’¢’°’£÷Ä’°’Ø’°’∂ ÷Ñ’°’≤’°÷Ñ’°’Ø’°’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’∞’°’¥’°’±’°’µ’∂` ’°÷Ä’£’•’¨’æ’∏÷Ç’¥ ’ß ÷Ö’£’ø’°’£’∏÷Ä’Æ’•’¨ ’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©’´ ’∂’µ’∏÷Ç’©’•÷Ä’® ’°’º’°’∂÷Å ’∫’°’ø’∑’°’≥ ’∞’≤’¥’°’∂, ’∂’•÷Ä’¢’•’º’∂’•’¨ ÷á ’°’µ’¨ ÷Ö’∂’¨’°’µ’∂ ’∞’°÷Ä’©’°’Ø’´÷Å ’æ’•÷Ä’¢’•’º’∂’•’¨ ’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©’´ ’∫’°’ø÷Ä’°’Ω’ø’°’Æ ÷á ’ø’°÷Ä’¢’•÷Ä’°’∂’∑’°’∂’® ’Ø÷Ä’∏’≤ ’ø’•’Ω’°’∂’µ’∏÷Ç’©’•÷Ä’®` ’°’º’°’∂÷Å ’∞’°’¥’°’∫’°’ø’°’Ω’≠’°’∂ ’∞’°’¥’°’±’°’µ’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂:
